content.title: ICD Therapy
content.statement: ICD Therapy is a fundamental concept in health-sciences medicine cardiology that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics.

explanation.intuition: Understanding ICD Therapy helps build foundational knowledge in this domain.

explanation.technical_details: Technical implementation involves applying the core principles of ICD Therapy to real-world scenarios.
